name: Stellaria media
Relationship: Compare: PULS. (similar in rheumatism, pains shifting, worse, rest, warmth; better cold air).

Head: Lassitude, indisposition to work
Smarting and burning in eyes, feel protruded
General irritability
Neck muscles stiff and sore
Eyes feel protruded
Dull, frontal headache; worse in morning and left side with sleepiness
Abdomen: Constipation or alternating constipation and diarrhoea
Liver engorged, swollen, with stitching pain and sensitive to pressure
Extremities: Rheumatoid pains in different parts of the body
Rheumatic pains in calves of legs
Sharp pain in small of back, over kidneys, in gluteal region, extending down thigh

details: Sharp, SHIFTING, rheumatic pains in all parts very pronounced. RHEUMATISM; darting pains in almost every part; stiffness of joints; parts sore to touch; worse motion. CHRONIC RHEUMATISM. SHIFTING PAINS. (PULS.; KALI-SULPH.) Psoriasis. Enlarged and inflamed gouty finger joints.Induces a condition of stasis, congestion, and sluggishness of all functions. Morning aggravation.
